ud1.5:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud1.5:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahamoggallano ayasma ca mahakassapo ayasma ca mahakaccano ayasma ca mahakotthiko ayasma ca mahakappino ayasma ca mahacundo ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca revato ayasma ca nando yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu.
ud1.5:2.1: Addasa kho bhagava te ayasmante duratova agacchante;
ud1.5:2.5: Evam vutte, annataro brahmanajatiko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
ud1.5:2.6: “kittavata nu kho, bhante, brahmano hoti, katame ca pana brahmanakarana dhamma”ti?
ud1.5:3.1: Atha kho bhagava etamattham viditva tayam velayam imam udanam udanesi:
